successes.title: Novus AEterno: MMO 4X RTS The Largest Strategy Game Ever.
successes.description: Negotiate, Trade, Dominate, Deceive in a Persistent Universe with thousands of players.

Pledges.description: Pizza Tier (Deprecated :))
The warm fuzzy feeling knowing you helped feed a indie developer +Forum early adopter medal! +Awesome avatar pack for ingame and forum use!
Colonial Peacekeeper (early bird!)
Everything in the $25 tier for those early birds!
Colonial Peacekeeper
Everything in the $10 tier, plus: +NOVUS AETERNO Steam key! +"Endgame" fleet Corvette for ingame use! +HQ digital wallpaper pack! +Digital Lore Bible!
Imperial Tribune
Everything in the $25 tier, plus: +Custom Trade Station, +"Endgame" fleet Destroyer for ingame use, +High quality digital concept art, +2 hour NOVUS AETERNO digital soundtrack!
Imperial Frontguard
Everything in the $35 tier, plus: +Reserve ingame username, +"Endgame" fleet Cruiser and Battleship for ingame use, +1 month of our premium account, +General's Strategy Guide.
Infiltrator (early bird!)
Everything in the $75 for the early birds!
Infiltrator

Everything in the $50 tier, plus: +Alpha (=Infiltrator) Access after the Kickstarter has been concluded successfully!  +"Endgame" fleet Dreadnaught and Super  freighter for ingame use (you now have the entire fleet!), +Digital Deceiver's Strategy Guide.
Master Merchant (early bird!)
Everything in the $100 tier for the early birds!
Master Merchant (early bird!)
Everything in the $100 tier for the early birds!
Master Merchant (pretty early bird!)
Everything in the $100 tier for the early birds!
Master Merchant

Everything in the $75 tier, plus: +"Karcharías" fleet Corvette and Destroyer for ingame use, +"Apocalypse" planet for ingame use (-population growth, +resource generation), +1 extra month of premium account (2 months in total!), +Merchant's Strategy Guide.
Diplomatic Envoy

Everything in the $100 tier, plus: +extra NOVUS AETERNO key with alpha access after the Kickstarter has been concluded successfully! (2 in total), +Reserve second username reservation, +"Karcharías" fleet Cruiser and Battleship for ingame use, +Diplomat's Strategy Guide
Genesis High Command (early bird!)
Everything in the $150 tier for the early birds!

Genesis High Command (Digital Only) 
Without the T-shirt, 10$ less and +3 month's Premium Account.

Everything in the $125 tier, plus:  +"Karcharías" fleet Dreadnaught and Super Freighter for ingame use (you now have this entire fleet!), +Design a research Theory with the developers!, +3 extra months of premium account (5 months in total!)
Genesis High Command (Moderately early bird!)
Everything in the $150 tier for the early birds!
Genesis High Command

Everything in the $125 tier, plus:  +"Karcharías" fleet Dreadnaught and Super Freighter for ingame use (you now have this entire fleet!), +"Genesis Command" T-shirt, +Design a research Theory with the developers!, +1 extra month of premium account (3 months in total!)
Academic Prototyper (Digital Early Bird)
